All Classes

Class Summary
Class Description
AdminWindow
This class is used to generate the admin window, so it provides the basic functions to view, edit and delete users.
AppointmentsDB
This class is used to create the appointments table, and provide operations for querying the appointments table.
AuthenticationWindow
In This class user will be able to login after adding valid username and authentication number.
DateLabelFormatter
This class is used to ensure that whenever the JDatePicker in the GUI is used the selected date is correctly formated
DBController
This class is used to establish a connection to the eHealth database.
DoctorDB
This class is used to create the doctor table, and provide operations for querying the doctor table.
EditAppointmentWindow
This class is for creating Edit Appointment Window design.
EditUserWindow
This class we are checking if user is exists or not.
LoginDialog
This class is used to generate the login window, so it provides the basic functions to login or for creating a new account.
Mail
This class is used to send e-mails.
main
This class is our main class, here we can start with the log in.
MainWindow
This class is used to generate the main window where you have options
OpenStreetMapUtils
This class is used to get the coordinates from an address and to calculate the distance between to points.
Password
This class is used to generate a hashed password.
RegisterWindow
This class is used to generate the register window if you want to create a new account.
reminder
This class is used to send reminder e-mails.
User
This class represents the user of the application.
UserDB
This class is used to create the user table, and provide operations for querying the user table.
